name: Income Tax
description: Every 24h, every citizen is taxed based on their taxable income, which is the difference between their current wealth in Euro and their weath in Euro the last tick subtracting the tax amount of last tickthe taxLastTick is also saved. The citizen pays a tax of 25% of their taxable income between 500€ and 2500€ and 45% of their taxable income above 2500€

properties.Title: Income Tax
properties.UserDescription:
Case 1:the citizen has more than 2500€ taxable income. They get taxed 500€ (25% of their income between 500€ and 2500€) + 45% of their income over 2500€
Case 2:the citizen has less than 2500€ taxable income, but more than 500€ taxable income. They get taxed 25% of their income above 500€
Case 3: the citizen has less than 500€ taxable income. They are not affected by the income tax.

properties.Title: LCP Adjustment
properties.UserDescription: If a citizen buys Land Claim Papers, then their real income is lowered. This is compensated by lowering wealthLastTick by 100€ per LCP traded

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon>: Was the good bought or sold by the initiating player?

When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon>: The buying player.
